quote: I really love this race. The environment is beautiful. Racing through the Galloway Forest Park in Scotland is incredible, and the atmosphere around the start and finish is so welcoming... The separate women's start is something I really appreciate.

I always like to be at the front of the change instead of following. We have a big advantage with this professional structure. Unbound is one of the biggest goals of the team, and as a team there we have a big advantage. We can play tactics and work together. That excites me.

I like to arrive early and do proper recons. I study the climbs, the downhills, the gravel and the lines. I want to know where time can be gained and where attacks might happen. That preparation is really important... If you know the course, you know where the top of the climb is.
